rules.avg_pressure: {"id":"avg_pressure","name":"","sql":"SELECT avg(pressure) from lps_data GROUP BY sensorId, TUMBLINGWINDOW(mi, 10);","actions":[{"mqtt":{"server":"tcp://mqtt:1884","topic":"info/avgPressure","runAsync":false,"omitIfEmpty":false,"sendSingle":true,"bufferLength":1024,"enableCache":false,"format":"json"}}],"options":{"restartStrategy":{}}}
rules.avg_temperature: {"id":"avg_temperature","name":"","sql":"SELECT avg(temperature) FROM lps_data GROUP BY sensorId, TUMBLINGWINDOW(mi, 10);\n","actions":[{"mqtt":{"server":"tcp://mqtt:1884","topic":"info/avgTemp","omitIfEmpty":false,"sendSingle":true,"format":"json","bufferLength":1024,"enableCache":false,"runAsync":false}}],"options":{"restartStrategy":{}}}
rules.low_temperature: {"id":"low_temperature","name":"","sql":"SELECT temperature FROM lps_data GROUP BY sensorId HAVING avg(temperature) < 15;\n","actions":[{"mqtt":{"server":"tcp://mqtt:1884","topic":"alarm/lowTemp","runAsync":false,"omitIfEmpty":false,"sendSingle":true,"bufferLength":1024,"enableCache":false,"format":"json"}}],"options":{"restartStrategy":{}}}
